title: Advice to a Prophet - "knuckled grip" implies

content.question: The phrase “knuckled grip” (line 20) primarily implies that the jack-pine

choices.label: will never really fall from the ledge
has roots that grasp like a hand
is very precariously attached to the ledge

content.answer: has roots that grasp like a hand

skill.text: Skill 6.C: Identify and explain the function of personification.
